keywords: convenience@serve with salad for complete meal
subtitle: A very simple recipe to make - especially if you buy the pastry.

method.text: Roll the pastry and use to line a 25 cm flan tin. Line the pastry case with greaseproof paper and fill with baking beans.
Bake for 20 min. Remove the beans and paper from the flan case and allow to cool. Reduce  oven temperature to 160°C.

title: Stilton and pepper quiche
